title: sOmasundarEshvaram
sahitya:
sOmasundarEshvaram bhajEham sOmAskandam nitya shuddha vasantOtsava vaibhavam


anupallavi

 himAdrijA ramaNam bhavataraNam vAma dEvAdi vandita caraNam


caraNam   karuNAmrta rasa jalEshvaram varam kadamba vana sthita kapAlEshvaram 
madhurApuri vilasita mahEshvaram cidAnanda gangAdharEshvaram vara 
guruguhEshvaram paramEshvaram vAnchitArtha phala dAyaka caturam
